page.title: 02A WETHERBY CHILD'S LEISURE
page.content:
"I draw animals from books or some times out of my head, but now and again I draw my dog (if she will stay still). I also read a lot. I read factual books, such as the Guinness Book of Records, which I enjoy reading very much. I like making things from wood. Sometimes I sit down hammering away and don't stop for 2-3 hours! I attempt to make shelves or nests for animals but they always end up in a heap of nails and wood. Despite all of these I also watch a lot of television."
Of all the leisure activities that were mentioned, in the junior school's survey, watching television was the most popular. Other activities included 'messing about' in the streets and ridihg bicycles, especially the now popular BMX type.
